pullrequest.title: CoM visuals based on a sphere with the density of lead

content.raw: A few minor comments, but otherwise this is so cool! Next I'd like to fix the physics side of things so mass and inertia can be updated dynamically, make it so resizing a simple shape will update the inertia, and maybe a gui tool for modifying inertia by resizing the equivalent shape. Fun stuff.
content.html: A few minor comments, but otherwise this is so cool! Next I'd like to fix the physics side of things so mass and inertia can be updated dynamically, make it so resizing a simple shape will update the inertia, and maybe a gui tool for modifying inertia by resizing the equivalent shape. Fun stuff.
